      • getActivity

        public ActivityConfiguration getActivity​(String activityId)
        Returns the ActivityConfiguration for a given activity model id
        Parameters:
        activityId - for the activity
        Returns:

      • getOrCreateActivity

        public ActivityConfiguration getOrCreateActivity​(String activityId)
        Returns the ActivityConfiguration for a given activity model id. If no such configuration exists, this method will create one.
        Parameters:
        activityId - for the activity
        Returns:
        Always a configuration for the given model-id, otherwise null.
